Name: Frequency of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' following 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of manuscripts entering 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' after 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all instances of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of times 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' leads to 'SW-EIC Major Revision'
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' leading to 'SW-EIC Accept' versus 'SW-EIC Reject'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' in relation to total activities in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all cases

Name: Average time from 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' to 'SW-EIC Decision' (Major Revision, Minor Revision, Accept, Reject)
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' that precede any form of 'SW-EIC Decision' (Major Revision, Minor Revision, Accept, Reject)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities per case
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities grouped by the last value of code

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' followed by 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' followed by 'SW-EIC Major Revision' in comparison to those followed by 'SW-EIC Minor Revision'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Ratio of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' to 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' for cases where activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities that occur after 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities that lead to a change in the assigned editor ('Assign a Different Editor')
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' in manuscripts that exceed the Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' for cases where activity 'Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' in the most frequent process variant
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all cases

Name: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities that are followed by 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities that occur before 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' in relation to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' for manuscripts requiring major revision
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities that precede 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' activities for cases where activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' followed by 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit' compared to 'SW-EIC Accept'
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage'}"
